body_html: You don't need to install for CPU. CPU installation is by default. Using with device("/cpu:0") will make all your operations run in CPU explicitly. To check the device placement i.e. where your operation is being executed you can take a look at the LOG_DEVICE_PLACEMENT flag.
body_text: You don't need to install for CPU. CPU installation is by default. Using with device("/cpu:0") will make all your operations run in CPU explicitly. To check the device placement i.e. where your operation is being executed you can take a look at the LOG_DEVICE_PLACEMENT flag.
body: You don't need to install for CPU. CPU installation is by default. Using `with device("/cpu:0")` will make all your operations run in CPU explicitly. To check the device placement i.e. where your operation is being executed you can take a look at the _LOG_DEVICE_PLACEMENT_ flag.
